marklogic.body: I'd give all the trolls 5 bucks to stay Off the blog for a week. The loons get 6 bucks. The Donald would get 10 bucks if he could be on the show and not mention China. I would give Obama a million to go back to Kenya. I would offer to pay for Biden's brain surgery, Harry Reid's life time meds for his senility, and a new face lift for Pelosi. I would throw Barney Frank a retirement party. He could invite 3 friends over for a movie and pizza, and no teddy bear PJ's. I would buy MO a membership in a fitness club. I would add a statue of George Washington the the grounds by the monument, with him holding out a hand with two fingers pointing to the capitol,, and a plaque that says, "I'm watching you!" I would buy Media Matters and the Huff, and Burn them to the ground. I would fly 1,000 Jews out of Russia to Israel, and send a million bucks to feed the starving Ethiopian Jews. I would offer all the folks who don't like America a free ticket one way to wherever they want to go. I would give Newt a contribution so he could run hard and beat Mitt at his own game. I would pay Geitner's taxes and throw him in jail, and hire a private investigater to get to the bottom of Fast and Furious, and thorw Holder in jail, too. Then, a chrome muzzle for Al Sharpton and Jesse Jackson. If I have any money left, I'm going to Israel for 6 months.
